name: Arthur The Squire
description:
The one thing that can make any man or boy king is to pull the sword from the stone. Are you that hero that Camelot needs! or just a clumsy squire!

Defend against dragons using your mighty swords, bow and arrows and the great book of magic.

Upgrade Arthur with new swords, arrows, shields and spells to defend Camelot from the Dragon invasions.

It will take a mighty Arthur to pull the sword from the stone and claim Camelot as the true King.

Explore Camelot and teach Arthur to fight and become the Knight of Camelot.

Set in a picturesque Camelot with simple tap controls.
